kpi.name: M145B2C2

kpi_info.title: Error code concerning the short disturbances counters
kpi_info.use: Error code concerning the short disturbances counters. Zero value means a successful report, nonzero value indicates that no disturbance counters are present. The value is a general DX error code in decimal format.

kpi.kpi_alias: Error code concerning the short disturbances counters
